comments.body: Not sure you end up with an absolute path here. `TrimPrefix` will cut the `/` too, and you're left with a path that has no leading `/`. From what I can tell, `filepath.FromSlash` does not add a leading `/`. https://play.golang.org/p/_A6DBoSG1V

@mtaufen yep, it doesn't add a leading '/'. And there are indeed issues about seccomp path.

`localhost/` is missing because of following code:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/72a2b0be6959191587470616148afdf2235b04ef/pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime/helpers.go#L278-L282

will add a new commit to fix this.
